title: Phenovar REST API request for endpoint: dxtablegenerator/generate
description: JSON request for the Phenovar REST API endpoint dxtablegenerator/generate.

externalid.title: External ID
externalid.description: A unique identifier for the patient. Typically the issuing laboratory ID. Required.

sex.title: Sex
sex.description: Sex of the patient. F for female, M for male. Version fran√ßaise: F pour femme, H pour homme. Optional.

maternal_affected.title: Mother is affected
maternal_affected.description: Whether the mother is affected. Optional.

paternal_affected.title: Father is affected
paternal_affected.description: Whether the father is affected. Optional.

label.title: Label
label.description: An additional label to identify patient. Optional.

patient_details.title: Patient Details ... ...
patient_details.description: Identifies the patient and provides optional attributes. Required.

phenotype_hpo_code_list.title: Phenotype HPO code list
phenotype_hpo_code_list.description: A list of HPO codes, one per phenotype. Required.

phenotype_onset_hpo_code.title: Phenotype onset HPO code
phenotype_onset_hpo_code.description: The HPO code for the global onset. Should be the earliest onset among the phenotypes listed in phenotype_hpo_code_list. Optional.

filepath.title: File path
filepath.description: Complete filename with path in download service (e.g. in S3 bucket).

reuse.title: Reuse
reuse.description: Reuse the already processed file. Optional.

analysis_files.title: Analysis files
analysis_files.description: A list of analysis file descriptors. Required.

download_source.title: Download source
download_source.description: Name of the source to manage downloads. Overrides user property download_source. Optional.

s3_bucket_name.title: S3 bucket name
s3_bucket_name.description: Name of the S3 bucket. Overrides user property. Optional.

s3_bucket_root_path.title: S3 bucket root path
s3_bucket_root_path.description: A root folder path that will be prepended to all filepaths in S3 bucket. Overrides user property. Optional.

dev_no_file_processing.title: No file processing (for dev only)
dev_no_file_processing.description: Disable file processing. Optional. For dev only.
